name: The Ball Encounter
description: The enemy balls that have many types and powerful skills and they try to attack our base. Our defence tower will automatically launch attack but is not enough to stop the balls, doing the magic skills in a good diverse way is key that could protect our base as a capable defenser.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Storage: 4 GB available space
